title: fried vegetables with seared tuna and a soy and sesame dressing
description: Juicy tuna served up fast and fresh, with a feast of stir-fried veg in a sweet and sour sauce.
ingredients: 1 red pepper, cut into thin strips
2 large carrots, cut into thin strips
2cm/1in piece of ginger, cut into thin strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper
